text.section: For any act which would justify the suspension of a license, other than a medical suspension, the authority may declare the person committing such act ineligible to receive a license for a period not to exceed one (1) year.
The length of a medical suspension shall be recommended by the medical review panel and approved by a majority vote of the board.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 20, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 14, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec 12.
